backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing blog posts with create, fetch, list, search, and slug retrieval, storing posts in a Map and sorting by published date.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a Google Form embed requirement to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high-level summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file defining metadata and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/registration.html: Static HTML entrypoint for the registration page loading the React app.
frontend/public/registration/index.html: Alternate static HTML entrypoint for the registration route loading the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all crawlers and pointing to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all main pages and sample blog posts with priorities and change frequency.
frontend/scripts/README-sitemap.md: Instructions for updating sitemap.xml when adding or modifying blog posts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration defining all site routes including registration, tasks, blog, and static pages.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCar: Blog post preview card showing title, date, excerpt, and link to full post.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyTaskSe: Daily task component opening random task links and accepting a secret code submission with success feedback.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with background image, Bengali intro text, and a CTA button linking to registration.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksMe: Displays a promotional TimeBucks earning card with bonus info and a signup button opening an external link.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksSt: Shows a step‑by‑step guide for earning with TimeBucks, including steps, tips, and a special note.
frontend/src/components/home/TranscribeM: Presents a TranscribeMe job overview with instructions, requirements, tips, and a CTA linking to the signup page.
frontend/src/components/home/WelcomeSect: Renders a welcome message from the site owner describing upcoming income resources.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileMen: Implements a slide‑in mobile navigation menu with links, scroll lock, and escape‑to‑close handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays the footer with copyright, social link, quick navigation links, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides the main site header with logo, navigation links, a tasks dropdown, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the full page layout including background, header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: Renders a styled placeholder box for ad spaces in various size variants.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Ads: Loads and cleans up an Adsterra script once and renders a container div for the native banner.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Aff: Displays a styled placeholder card for affiliate links with title, description, and button.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Sets document title and updates SEO, Open Graph, Twitter, and canonical meta tags dynamically.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskHowToC: Shows a static four‑step guide explaining how to complete a task.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskIntera: Provides a start‑work button and form to submit a secret code with success feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Hooks for fetching, retrieving, and searching blog posts using the actor with fallbacks to sample data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive CSS variables and themed backgrounds for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts: Provides fallback sample blog posts when the backend has no data.
frontend/src/lib/helpLinks.ts: Exports a list of admin help links with labels and URLs.
frontend/src/lib/registrationConfig.ts: Holds configuration for the registration page, including an embeddable Google Form URL.
frontend/src/lib/siteConfig.ts: Defines global site metadata such as name, description, and default image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with biography, expertise sections, contact info, and ads.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with loading, error, and empty states along with ads.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a full blog post with metadata, content, ads, and navigation back to the blog list.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with SEO setup, hero section, and welcome content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentProofPage.tsx: Displays payment proof images in a gallery with upload link and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Renders the registration page with hero section, embedded Google Form, and CTA button.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Support page showing two admin contacts with Facebook links and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Task1Page.tsx: Task 1 page with SEO, task instructions, a task interaction card, and a back-to-home link.
frontend/src/pages/Task2Page.tsx: Task 2 page providing instructions, a task interaction card with its URL, and a back-to-home link.
frontend/src/pages/Task3Page.tsx: Task 3 page including instructions, a task interaction card, SEO config, and a back-to-home link.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, radius, shadows, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, required UI changes, architectural notes, known issues, and feature metadata for ongoing development.
